adblocking_headline.message: Ads distract you and steal your precious time?

adblocking_toggle_on.message: Now you can browse undisturbed and websites load faster

antiphishing_headline.message: Phishing sites try to steal your passwords and credit card information

antiphishing_toggle_on.message: You are now protected from phishing sites and identity theft

antitracking_headline.message: Trackers monitor everything you do on the Internet

antitracking_tooltip_text.message: This means that they can no longer collect private data to create a personal profile of you.

popup_explanation.message: Here you can change your privacy and search settings at any time

popup_protection_description.message: Activate all features to fully protect your privacy

popup_protection_headline.message: You are not fully protected yet

popup_skip_description.message: Skipping will set your browser to full protection.

protection_explanation.message: Here you can change your privacy and search settings at any time
